doc.name: Income Tax (Managed Investment Trust Withholding Tax) Act 2008
doc.citation: Income Tax (Managed Investment Trust Withholding Tax) Act 2008

chunks.title: Section 1 - Short title
chunks.structure_path: Income Tax (Managed Investment Trust Withholding Tax) Act 2008 > Section 1
chunks.text: This Act may be cited as the Income Tax (Managed Investment Trust Withholding Tax) Act 2008.

chunks.title: Section 2 - Commencement
chunks.structure_path: Income Tax (Managed Investment Trust Withholding Tax) Act 2008 > Section 2
chunks.text: This Act commences on the day on which it receives the Royal Assent.

chunks.title: Section 2A Definitions "clean building managed investment trust"
chunks.structure_path: Income Tax (Managed Investment Trust Withholding Tax) Act 2008 > Section 2A
chunks.text: "clean building managed investment trust" has the same meaning as in the Income Tax Assessment Act 1997.

chunks.title: Section 2A Definitions "entity"
chunks.structure_path: Income Tax (Managed Investment Trust Withholding Tax) Act 2008 > Section 2A
chunks.text: "entity" has the same meaning as in the Income Tax Assessment Act 1997.

chunks.title: Section 2A Definitions "fund payment"
chunks.structure_path: Income Tax (Managed Investment Trust Withholding Tax) Act 2008 > Section 2A
chunks.text: "fund payment" has the same meaning as in the Income Tax Assessment Act 1997.

chunks.title: Section 2A Definitions "income year"
chunks.structure_path: Income Tax (Managed Investment Trust Withholding Tax) Act 2008 > Section 2A
chunks.text: "income year" has the same meaning as in the Income Tax Assessment Act 1997.

chunks.title: Section 2A Definitions "information exchange country"
chunks.structure_path: Income Tax (Managed Investment Trust Withholding Tax) Act 2008 > Section 2A
chunks.text: "information exchange country" has the same meaning as in the Income Tax Assessment Act 1997.

chunks.title: Section 2A Definitions "non-concessional MIT income"
chunks.structure_path: Income Tax (Managed Investment Trust Withholding Tax) Act 2008 > Section 2A
chunks.text: "non-concessional MIT income" has the same meaning as in the Income Tax Assessment Act 1997.

chunks.title: Section 3 - Imposition of tax
chunks.structure_path: Income Tax (Managed Investment Trust Withholding Tax) Act 2008 > Section 3
chunks.text: The tax known as income tax, to the extent that that tax is payable by an entity in accordance with section  840-805 of the Income Tax Assessment Act 1997, is imposed on amounts identified in that section as the fund payment part.

chunks.title: Section 4 - Rate of tax
chunks.structure_path: Income Tax (Managed Investment Trust Withholding Tax) Act 2008 > Section 4
chunks.text:
(1) The rate of income tax imposed by this Act is:
 (a) if the entity is a resident of an information exchange country:
 (i) 15% for fund payments (except to the extent mentioned in subparagraph  (ii) or (iii)); or
 (ii) 10% for fund payments, to the extent that they are, or are attributable to, fund payments from a clean building managed investment trust (except to the extent mentioned in subparagraph  (iii)); or
 (iii) 30% for fund payments, to the extent that they are attributable to non -concessional MIT income; or
 (b) otherwise--30%.
 (3) An entity is a resident of an information exchange country if:
 (a) the entity is a resident of that country for the purposes of the taxation laws of that country; or
 (b) if there are no taxation laws of that country applicable to the entity or the entity's residency status cannot be determined under those laws:
 (i) for an individual--the individual is ordinarily resident in that country; or
 (ii) for another entity--the entity is incorporated or formed in that country and is carrying on a business in that country.
